attributes.action: stop the planned replacement of the BA concorde model on concorde roundabout at BAA Heathrow with an emirates A380 model
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The concorde model has been an iconic part of Heathrow airport for sixteen years but if the plans go ahead it will be replaced be an emirates A380 model. The new model will not have at all the same value of pride national value and history that the concorde model holds.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
